body.name: Mini Security Camera, 1080P HD WiFi Home Indoor Outdoor Camera for Baby/Pet/Nanny, IP Camera Remote Viewing for Security with iOS,Android Phone APP…
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 16 hrs 42 mins
features: [150°Wide-angle & 1080P HD] With 150° wide-angle lens and 1080P HD reselution, senri mini camera captures details clearly and provide you with a larger view of everything indoors. With its excellent structural design, it can be easily hidden anywhere to watch your home, office, yard and etc.

[2022 Version WiFi Camera] senri mini wireless camera is the latest product in 2022, supports iOS and Android devices, download the APP and connect it to the network, you can view live video on the App from anywhere in the world. The video can be save in the micro SD card, you can view the material on phone, pad, computer.

[Video Recording 24/7 when charged] This spy camera contains high-quality rechargeable lithium-ion battery, which can last for about 120 min. And you can connect it to power bank or other USB ports to get a longer time recording, or connect to the power supply to achieve 24/7 continuously turning on.

[5m Infra-red Night Vision] Equipped with 6 invisible and non-luminous infrared lights, this mini camera provides a outstanding night view range up to 5m, perfect for your room’s day and night supervision. It can record 10m in the daytime.

[128GB SD Card Supported & Technical Support] senri mini camera support SD card from 2GB to 128GB( not included). And senri provides 30 days money back, 3 year technical support, if you have any problem about our cameras, contact us in time.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 2.3 2.3 out of 5 stars 452 ratings 2.3 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 1 minute to connect Camera 1. Download the APP 2. Turn on the camera, the blue light is flashing. Open you phone WLAN, connect to camera's hotspot network(FTYXXXXX) 3. Open the APP and find camera, connect it. 4. Click "Setting" and choose "WIFI Setting" then connect to your home WIFI. Done. Then you can view the picture online wherever you are.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does not work with 5G/requires access to ALL the things
reviews.reviewText: The instructions were basically nonsensical and poorly translated. The picture leaves a lot to be desired. It isn’t what I would call a wide-angle of view, either. The camera setup is overly-complicated and the camera doesn’t work with 5G. Only “2 .4G” (I’m just assuming the period is meant to be a dash?). Charges quickly, I’ll give it that. But you have to sign in to its custom Wi-Fi which is an unsecured network and continually gives errors that you need to connect it to a hotspot, when you cannot do both. It requires control of your phone’s microphone 24/7 and wants access to your camera and gallery so that it may record and store photos and videos. You can choose to only allow access to certain photos and it will only access its own. I was able to get it up and running and even recording and taking pictures, even though it was always saying either that the camera was “connecting…” for quite some time, or that it failed. The motion detector doesn’t work and the audio it records is from your phone, not from its own microphone, which makes zero sense to me. You have to be watching the live feed from your phone to see what’s going on, there’s nothing that alerts you to a motion on camera or takes photos or records videos automatically upon sensing motion. It lags considerably behind the live feed and freezes up quite a bit. It’s not worth the threat to your privacy and personal data to allow all the permissions this app requires for the very little performance you get in return. And I prefer to be signed in to my own Wi-Fi and you can’t do that and have the camera functioning at all. Well, you get what you pay for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I prefer gadgets that are as advertised.
reviews.reviewText: Dislike: Included instructions are vague, It's a pain to set-up, to keep set-up, on board battery and controls on the camera don't operate as advertised. Backup from the company was terrible from seller or manufacturer.Likes: they are small and would be hideable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Plan on returning
reviews.reviewText: I can’t even get it set up smh! Nothing I do seem to connect it. The device name isn’t even presented on the box or package or it just don’t match the devices that come up on the Bluetooth search. I’ve tried every way to connect it and it won’t work. I’m highly disappointed and this was a waste of money and time

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product is junk I recommend no one to buy this .Does not work after being charged for 24 hrs and it will not connect to my phoneJust a junk product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s a small cute camera poor video quality when you finally get it to turn on I used my own cable the one it came with was defective the camera hooked up to my phone at that point the app downloaded fine but the Wi-Fi will not connect still to the router but for $10 it’s not a bad product of you can just leave it with a SIM card I just need real time for yelling at the cat when she starts clawing up my couch

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars A9 mini camera
reviews.reviewText: The A9 High Definition Mini Camera is an impressive piece of technology that offers a compact and versatile solution for capturing high-definition footage. With a wide range of features, it excels in various scenarios, making it an ideal choice for those looking for a portable and powerful mini camera. The Only Downside: No Infrared Capabilities:It's worth noting that the only downside of the A9 camera is the absence of infrared capabilities. This means that it may not be suited for low-light or night-time recording conditions. However, this shouldn't overshadow the wealth of other features and benefits it offers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Camera is Small
reviews.reviewText: Camera is extremely small I purchased 2 for the very 1st time, one works and the other one doesn't. You get what you pay for image wise. You download the app the link the camera to your wifi which allows you to hear and view recordings it also gives you the options to take a picture. I'm disappointed that both cameras are not working, I will be contacting the seller.Update DO NOT PURCHASE WASTE OF MONEY!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: First, installation is a pain because the setup steps aren't clear. Then when you get it set up it's on like a 10x zoom and can't change it so the whole seeing a room isn't true. To see a whole room you need the room to be mansion sized. 3rd the camera consistently says session overloaded. There is no night vision at all to these camera. Disappointing I bought 4... huge waste of money.
